document_data.name: Althune Dembrar
document_data.mainbody: '''Althune Dembrar''' was the head [[cleric]] of [[Deneir]] in [[Berdusk]] in [[1359 DR]].
document_data.Activities: An expert in symbols, Althune managed the local temple to Deneir. She resided inside [[Twilight Hall]].
document_data.Relationship: Althune was a strong ally of the [[Harpers]] and acted as their eyes and ears.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Some gossiped about Althune Dembrar having a romantic encounter with the unnamed Baron of [[Gateford]], however these scandalous rumors were never confirmed.
